claims.object: Ensuring proper grounding of test and measurement device

surface_layer.definition: A connection to ground used for safety and signal integrity.

deep_layer.mechanism: Provides a low-impedance path for fault currents to flow back to the source, allowing protective devices to operate and clear the fault.
deep_layer.origin: Derived from the concept of connecting electrical circuits to the earth to provide a reference point.

examples: Ground connection in a household electrical outlet

epistemic_metadata.source: Instrument Grounding and Guide for the Right Setup, Grounding Guide for Test and Measurement Devices - NI
